loading.message: There are no chapters available, create your own ones.

save.title: Chapters have been saved successfully!
save.message: The segments have been cached successfully. To publish the chapters, select 'Publish'.

publish.title: Chapters have been published successfully!
publish.message: The segments have been uploaded successfully and will be processed soon!

publish.title: Publish chapter to videosystem
publish.message: This will publish the chapters to the videosystem. After processing, the chapters will be available in the player. Are you sure you want to publish the chapters?

update.title: Update | Delete closest chapter
update.message: Searches for closest chapter on the timeline from current time. You can use the control buttons to seek 1 second to the left or right to find the right position for updates.

addMarker.title: Add chapter
addMarker.message: Sets the startpoint of a chapter, the next chapter will set the duration of the previous one automaticly.

saveAndPublish.title: Save | Publish
saveAndPublish.message: Save chapters temporarily for later editing or publish them to the videosystem.

table.title: Table
table.message: Change time, edit title (not shown in videoplayer yet), play or delete chapter. Scroll down to see all chapters!

editor.title: Introduction Tour
editor.message: Chapters are segments of the video, displayed in the player for faster navigation through a video. The chapters are created automatically based on detected slide transitions. This tool helps you to edit, change or update your chapters.
